de.fhb.sailboat.communication

Class ModuleWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • de.fhb.sailboat.communication.ModuleWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ModuleWorker
extends java.lang.Thread
    Serves as background thread for calling the requestObject method on the TransmissionModule instances.
    A ModuleWorker is created for each registered module.
    Author:
    Michael Kant

        commBase - The CommunicationBase object where this object was created from.
        commModule - The associated TransmissionModule, which will be controlled.
        The - ID of the associated TransmissionModule. It's added to the outgoing packets, when sending data.
